sect1.title: Synopsis
sect1.para: On this page, open workflow connections can be selected to serve as inputs and outputs for the integrated workflow components. Inputs with the constraint Required are mandatory.

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Expand the desired components in the table and select the inputs/outputs via the checkbox. Use the filter mechanism to search for specific details, e.g. name, type, component.

The names of inputs and outputs of the integrated workflow component are the mapped names in the last column of the table. Mapped names can be edited by selecting the desired cell. Note that two inputs respectively outputs cannot have the same name.
